IExtn:; 2223 2318 24588 2553 (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transport and Highways) #11-5 W 6, #ver-10, ETq, #f fczf-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn: 1Sth July 2008 POLICY MATTERS- ADMINISTRATIONIFINANCE (38/2008) [Decision taken on file No. NHAIICM /Elect/Circular/z008-Admn] Sub: Procurement of Equipments pertaining to computerization of Toll Plaza It has been decided that PIUICMUs will procure   required hardware, software, printers and other peripherals for computerization of toll plaza as per the procedure given below: For  computerization of new tollplazas request has to be sent to GM (Electronics) indicating the number of lanes well in advance before the tolling begins. bl For computerizalilon of additional lanes %f exlsting/ shifted Toll plazas request has to be sent to GM (Electronics) indicating the required additional lanesl booths well in advance. 2 Before sending the request for procurement; PD may ensure the essential infrastructure for setting up of the tolling systems as circulated to all PDs vide letter ref no: 11013/165/2005/1T dated 05.05.2006 (copy enclosed): In addition, stabilized power supply may also be arranged at the toll plaza: 3 After the receipt of request from PDs, CM division shall obtain administrative/ financial approval from the Competent Authority and communicate the same to respective PD along with sample bid document. Project Directors shall follow the laid down procurement procedure and guidelines of NHAI inviting competitive   quotations after publishing in local newspapers A committee may be constituted at PIU level with representatives from Finance and adjoining PIUs among other members. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority.
